name: Facebook - Friend Finder [Remover]
description: Facebook - Friend Finder [Remover] will remove the Find Friends content on the left column where you should see the following: Best Friend, Coworkers and Classmates. This new style should also remove the ContextualHelp located on the right column where it some times say: Add a Picture of Yourself or even Welcome to Your Profile Get Inspired: See Friend's Profile. See other things you wish to see off your Facebook page? Just let me know!

user.name: ShinnHayabusa
user.about: Greetings! I am Shinn, a young hardcore gamer looking for the best games out there in the wide world of video games. I am a very creative and well qualified for web development, picture editing and audio editing. I tend to be very quiet since I have hard time dealing with my English. I like being with friends and screwing around, trying to keep them entertained. I sometimes let myself go a bit too often, but at least I manage to make good friends. Anything else you want to know ? Feel free to send me an email on Google + or Hotmail or even Facebook.
